ogTitle: Travel Hakodate - 函館市觀光資訊官方網站 - 日本北海道
ogSiteName: Travel Hakodate - 函館市觀光資訊官方網站 - 日本北海道
ogDescription: Travel Hakodate is a website of the city of Hakodate and it sends out information about sightseeing in Hakodate and its cityscape through the Internet. Among the information are the night view from Mt. Hakodate, gourmet food, sightseeing on foot, and events, which are worth seeing.
